meanings.definition: To engage in amorous play or cuddling.
meanings.sent1: The couple was canoodling on the park bench, enjoying each other's company.
meanings.sent2: They were canoodling by the fireplace, wrapped in a warm blanket.
meanings.sent3: The puppies were canoodling in the sun, looking adorable.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed to be canoodling with the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The children were canoodling with their favorite toys, lost in their own world.

meanings.sent1: The young couple was canoodling under the stars, lost in their own world.
meanings.sent2: They were caught canoodling in the hallway, blushing furiously.
meanings.sent3: The kittens were canoodling in the cozy basket, looking content.
meanings.sent4: The waves canoodled with the shore, creating a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The old friends were canoodling on the park bench, reminiscing about the good old days.
